content.description: This is a fun climb that is mostly 5.10+ leading up to the crux move at the top.
content.location: It is the second route on the wall, looking at it from left to right.

climbs.name: Party in The USA
climbs.fa: bolted by Luke Mehall, first free ascent by Melissa Clutter

content.description:
This is another 5.10 for Cascade. It could clean up and be a good moderate. At the moment, it's still dirty. Most of the loose rock is cleaned off, but I'm sure some holds will still break off. Like most of the routes in Cascade, this route will need traffic to stay clean. Anyhoo, a shout out to Melissa Clutter who got her first, "first ascent' on this one!

One old stud was found near the existing first bolt, but we didn't notice any more old bolts.
content.protection: This has Climb Tech Mussys at the top! Feel free to toprope and lower on those! They will take years to wear through.
content.location:
It is right of

U.S. Blues

.

content.description:
The Kindness Conspiracy has 5.11c face climbing and finishes up in a crack!

Dave Chappelle inspired the name. Look it up!
content.protection: This has Climb Tech Mussys at the top! Feel free to toprope and lower on those! They will take years to wear through.
content.location:
It is located in between

US Blues

and

Party in the USA

.

content.description: American Girl checks in as one of the more moderate routes in Cascade Canyon.
content.location: This is the leftmost line on the wall.
